platformAttributes.ios.subtitle.k: 凍結していた思い出を追体験しよう
追尋遠久的記憶，喚醒塵封的時光

platformAttributes.ios.editorialNotes.st.k: Hindsight is a somber yet powerful exploration of the ways objects and scenes that pass through our lives can unlock and affect memories. By the end, this contemplative and cinematic story suggests that some of the problems in our personal relationships may be a little like its puzzles: Maybe we could have solved them if we’d just taken the time to look at things from a different perspective. Expect this adventure to linger long after it’s over.
